attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The goverment continually put pressure on our armed forces by deploying them around the world. These deployments are becoming more often. While families struggle at home on inadequate wages for what is expected of them. while the goverment taxes everything that we do more and more.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
